name: 海岛守卫 Island guards
description:
What is this work



Watch of the Sea is a horizontal casual tower defense game where players can strengthen their characters to enhance their defenses, but also combine powerful skill combinations from random elements to effectively defend against enemies


What can you do if you don't like this game? [/b][/h2]


Beach Watch is moderately difficult. If you feel that the gameplay is not good, or the completion time is too short, you can apply for a refund from customer service

First indie game, welcome to comment, thank you
